title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES APPOINTS KEITH JOHNSON AS VICE PRESIDENT AND GENERAL MANAGER

content.rendered:
is proud to announce the promotion of Keith Johnson to the role of Vice President and General Manager. Keith transitions into this new leadership position following a successful tenure as the company’s Director of Materials and Production Control.


In his previous role, Mr. Johnson played a pivotal part in transforming Professional Aircraft Accessories’ material management, inventory control, master scheduling, and supply chain management systems. His dedicated efforts have consistently driven the company toward operational excellence and enhanced efficiency.

"Keith stands out as an exceptional leader," said Greenwich AeroGroup Vice Chairman Jim Ziegler. "With his comprehensive experience in aerospace support and his proven ability to manage sizable teams and drive strategic initiatives effectively, we are confident that he is the ideal fit for this role."

“I am honored and eager to embrace the responsibilities and opportunities that come with the role here at Professional Aircraft Accessories,” said Mr. Johnson. “Having been a part of this incredible team I’ve seen firsthand the dedication and expertise that makes this company stand out. I am committed to building on our successes, driving innovation, and leading our team to deliver excellence and unparalleled service to our clients.”

Mr. Johnson’s aviation experience spans over three decades, starting in the United States Air Force and leading through various high-profile roles at Delta Air Lines, Comair, Air Wisconsin Airlines, AAR Corp, and Citadel Completions, LLC.


Mr. Johnson assumes his new responsibilities effective immediately.

excerpt.rendered: We are proud to announce the promotion of Keith Johnson to the role of Vice President and General Manager.
